plot: Jess & Andy try to have some time alone away from simple distractions. But due to conflicting desires an argument ensues, typical among the two, deeper truths arise.
title: This, We Have Now: Jess & Andy
plot_es: Jess & Andy try to have some time alone away from simple distractions. But due to conflicting desires an argument ensues, typical among the two, deeper truths arise.
original_name: This, We Have Now: Jess & Andy
plot_en: Jess & Andy try to have some time alone away from simple distractions. But due to conflicting desires an argument ensues, typical among the two, deeper truths arise.
